page.title: 04The Village Policeman.
page.content: Law and order is maintained in Scotter and{12}other villages by{1}police constable who lives in a police house in {Scotter.}Joined to this house is a small office, where he does his paperwork,and a garage for his{panda {car}, which he needs to patrol such a large area.The nearest police station is in{Gainsborough}which provides all the specialized backup services he might need. Emergency 999 calls are dealt with at{Gainsborough}or{ {Scunthorpe}.He works from{9am to 5pm} but is really never off duty. If he is away he is not replaced but extra cars from Gainsborough patrol his beat. {Crime prevention}rather than the solving of crime is his major responsibility.Therefore he visits schools,clubs,meetings and any functions in the area to get to know people.
